Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgSource.LivingThings
      • rpgSource.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actions, PlayerActions

    public class Player
extends LivingThings
implements PlayerActions
    This class controls everything that the user wants to do.

    FlightGuy

      • useAMove

        public double useAMove(int moveSelector)
        This method uses the user's input to determine which move to use and calculate damage that the user's attack would do.
        Specified by:
        useAMove in interface Actions
        Parameters:
        moveSelector - The input selected by the user used to chose a specific move.
        Returns:
        The damage the user would deal if the attack's receiver didn't have defense.
